summary: Comprehensive testing of Star Trade multilingual system completed successfully. All features working: language selector (PT/EN/ES), hero text translations, admin dashboard login, and multilingual settings management.
passed_tests: API /api/settings returns TranslatableText format for hero.title, hero.subtitle, hero.cta_text
API /api/settings returns TranslatableText format for about.title, about.paragraph1, about.paragraph2
API /api/settings returns hero.video_url for fullscreen video
Language selector displays correctly with flag emojis (ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡· ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸)

Switching to English changes hero title to 'Connecting the World Through International Trade'
Switching to Spanish changes hero title to 'Conectando el Mundo a travÃ©s del Comercio Internacional'
Switching to Portuguese changes hero title to 'Conectando o Mundo atravÃ©s do ComÃ©rcio Internacional'
Navigation menu changes with language (About Us / QuiÃ©nes Somos / Quem Somos)
CTA button text changes with language (Talk to a Specialist / Hable con un Especialista / Fale com um Especialista)
Hero video has fullscreen styling (inset-0, w-full, h-full, object-cover)
Admin login works with credentials admin@startrade.com / StarTrade2024!
Admin dashboard displays stats (messages, blog posts, areas)
Settings page accessible with Hero tab
Hero settings show multilingual inputs for Title (PT/EN/ES)
Hero settings show multilingual inputs for Subtitle (PT/EN/ES)
Hero settings show multilingual inputs for CTA text (PT/EN/ES)
Hero settings include video URL field
Hero settings include positioning controls (vertical/horizontal alignment)
Hero settings include styling controls (title size, weight, overlay opacity)
Authentication API works correctly (login, register, /auth/me)
Areas API returns list of areas
Blog API returns list of posts
Contact form submission works
seed_data_creation: Contact form test message created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multilingual system fully functional. TranslatableText model with {pt, en, es} fields working correctly. Frontend getText() function extracts correct language based on i18next. Admin dashboard Hero settings allow editing all 3 languages. Video hero is fullscreen with proper CSS classes.

mocked_apis.email_sending: Only logs to console, no actual email sent

fullscreen_video.css_classes: absolute inset-0 w-full h-full object-cover z-0
